players.name: Alice
memory: You: "This is terrible! Diana was killed on the first night. We need to think carefully about who could have done this and look for any suspicious behavior."
Bob: "I agree with Alice. Let's keep an eye on each other and look for any inconsistencies or unusual behavior from our fellow town members."
You: "Bob, I noticed you agreed with me earlier but then went silent. That seems a bit odd - why not share more of your thoughts about who might be suspicious?"
Charlie: "Alice, I believe you're the mafioso based on my investigation during Night 1. It's important for us to work together and expose the truth to keep our town safe."
